summary: A retexture of draugrs to make them look more menacing and evil. For my up and coming mod for when the creation kit is released.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE!

This is now a retexture of Draugr\'s so they look more like their bloodmoon companions, or just so they look scarier than they did in vanilla skyrim. I\'ve also retextured the weapons to fit with their darker theme. I\'ll texture some skeletons as well later on some time.
author: The Awkward Avenger
